name: vknits
text: You get what you pay for. It's hot and ready. I would recommend Cheese Italian bread, extra most bestest pepperoni pizza, or their regular hot and ready pizzas.

name: Jacob Zinn
text: So it’s closed and now a O’kanes kitchen now at this location

name: Mandy Eckler
text: Never come here, they will try and rip you off and if you call in to order and you ask questions they will yell and then hang up on you..   A lady that works there that says she is the owner, started screaming at my husband and I, (we don't no why) before hanging up on us.. We was just simply asking questions before we ordered our food..

name: Josh Weissflug
text: Walked in 20 minutes before they closed. They both were friendly, smiling, didn't fuss I showed up late, cooked me a fresh pie and sent me to work happy. Customer service win!

name: Amanda Hastings
text: We were waiting for our pizza to be cooked and watched a lady with her son order then change her order a few seconds later because they decided on something else. …More

name: Denise Allen
text: Stood there waiting on someone to help me as 1 guy (I think the mngr) just kept walking back & forth not doing anything.  It was ridiculous, I ordered & paid online but he acted like he was too busy to help me.  After 10 minutes of standing …More

name: Destiny Smith
text: Very long wait, definitely not Hot N READY.  It took at least 15min for ONE cheese pizza, and we were the only ones there.  And my pizza was horrible, they have like 15 bubbles on the pizza with barley any cheese.

name: fida abouchleih
text: I just love their thin crust cheese pizza wow it tastes crunchy and amazing

name: Charles Wentworth
text: horrible pizza joint. completely awful service. ordered a half pepperoni half sausage pizza. the slothful CSR, too inebriated to remember a simple order, botched the whole thing up. what i got was an atrocity against mankind itself. a three …More

name: Kenneth Parker
text: Great value and one of my favorite pizza chains!

name: Stephanie Cassidy
text: They won’t even answer the phone ever. Horrible customer service!

name: Scott Buesse
text: Fast, easy and inexpensive. Best bang for the buck for pizza anywhere. We were in and out in under 3 minutes and picked up 4 Hot and Ready pizzas. Awesome!!

name: Amy Arentson
text: Fast and easy. We like grabbing a pizza and going on the run. Hot n ready is clutch.

name: Shannon Jamison
text: Great pizza and wings for a very good price.Nice and clean environment and the employees are very respectful.

name: Mary Martin
text: I have never had such unprofessional service at a little caesars. The way the "lead" person was running the restaurant was terrible. He was yelling out what did everyone have. Wouldn't make crazy combos for anyone and wasn't apologetic or …More

name: Lauren Molitor
text: So much for hot and ready.  I stood for 20 min for 2 pepperoni pizzas when the guy said it would be right out. And I watched him hand over one of the pizzas waiting to someone who just walked in.  Dont Lee the guys name but this place is very unorganized

name: Greg Jenner
text: Love Little Caesars to death. Love their Pizza better than imos honestly. Little Caesars Pizza has reasonable prices for their Pizza.

name: David Early
text:
The most filling and delicious five bucks ($7.04 with soda and tax) I could spend.
I'm a regular customer, and the pizza hasn't been the most consistent at any of …More

name: carrie burnam
text: Awesome pizza, wings, & breadsticks for the $

name: Will Klein
text: I have found that there is always a wait at this location, so Hot n Ready, is false at this location.

name: Robert Alessi
text: Wish they had better cheese. They are not as good as the were years ago but still a goodt value.

name: Liam G
text: Good and quick

name: Mare Barrows
text: It was the 4th so I call to see if they where open. I went in there some teenage girl was making fun of me for calling and not knowing I was in there!

name: Morgan Graczyk
text: Great service! Got my food out quick and my pizza was delicious!

name: LeaAnn Grimshaw
text: The people are helpful and polite. The pizza is consistent and inexpensive.

name: Daiana Schandler
text: I LOVE this Little Caesar's location!!! The pizza is always hot and always fresh. The service is always top notch, but when Jordan is working: Aaaah! It. Is. Perfection. I love that girl! She takes pride in her art. When I order my favorite …More

name: Michele Whittaker
text: Love the online ordering and the pizza portal.

name: Terrance long
text: Everytime has been a great experience

name: Nathan Byrd
text: Not the best pizza, but it's fast and very cheap. Good if you just want to grab something and go.

name: Joe Marsh
text: Nice staff but literally the slowest little ceases I've been to waited 20 minutes for my pizza

name: Jeanette Pumphrey
text: When you're in the mood for pizza it's by far the cheapest and well-made pies, bread sticks

name: David P
text: A voucher should be for the product or service that was not provided not for something different. When I go to take advantage of a deal for a free item but you can't fulfill it don't expect me to pay for extra things that I don't want in order to get the free item.

name: Dorothy Suwanpratest
text: Very prompt and very friendly service
